caption.title: Mean percentage of surviving settlers of Platygyra acuta.
caption.p: Mean (+SE) percentage (%) of surviving settlers of Platygyra acuta in response to different temperature and salinity treatments ( n = 3 replicates per treatment). * denotes those results of pairwise comparisons that showed significant difference ( P < 0.05) between ambient salinity and lowered salinity treatments under the fixed factor of temperature. Data indicated with the same letter showed no significant difference in percentage of post-settlement survival (Mixed ANOVA, P > 0.05; Table 1B).
